```{r}
# Libraries and functions
library(tidyverse)
library(qreport)
library(kableExtra)

# Load data processing functions
source("../../Functions/data_processing_functions.R")
```

```{r}
# Get Data
current_season_data <- get_fantasy_data(season = 2023)

# Top Averages
current_season_data |> 
  filter(tog_percentage > 0) |> 
  select(player_full_name, fantasy_points) |> 
  summarise(avg_score = mean(fantasy_points), games = n(), .by = player_full_name) |> 
  arrange(desc(avg_score))
```
